creator: renaud.richardet@wyona.com
text:
Creating a new document with Document ID does:not_work will cause an exception
(No resource type defined for document [default:authoring:/index/does:not_work]!)

It seems that the validation is not implemented in 1.4 yet. Should it be done
like in 1.2 with a javascript (function validateForm(theForm))?

No, rather not. There was a discussion on the dev list about the responsibility
of validating document IDs. The call to this method should be placed in
CreateDocument.checkExecutionConditions(). IIRC such a method already exists,
I'll take a look at it.
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
The method in question is

  DocumentManager.isValidDocumentName(String)

It is called in ChangeNodeID, but not yet in CreateDocument. I'll take care of it.
